name: src/Component.js
Component
state
description: The state of the current store

name: constructor
description: Constructor of a component.

params.name: props
params.description: the props (attributes pass to dom node + children)

name: props
description: The props  (attributes pass to dom node + children).

name: store
description: The store share between all components.

name: nodeRefHandler
description: Do not touch :)

name: node
description: Parent node of the component.

name: refresh
description:
Method to call to refresh the component without the use of the store.
Useful for internal state with this.

name: reactToChangeState
description:
Internally method which is called when an event of {@link eventsToSubscribe}
You can override the method if you want a specific

name: eventsToSubscribe
description: Method to implement to react when an event is send to {@link Store}

return.description: array of string events to react.

name: eventsToReact
description: Method to implement to react when an event that does not imply re rendering is sent to {@link Store}

return.description: array of string events to react without rendering.

name: react
description: Method to implement called when an event that does not imply re rendering is sent to {@link Store}

name: mustRefresh
description: Return false to avoid call to render on an event.

name: componentDidMount
description: Method called after rendered into DOM.

name: renderComponent
description: Method use internally to render a component.

return.description: This return a component or result of SimpleDom.el.

name: render
description: Method to implement to render something.

return.description: This return a component or result of {@link el}.

name: src/ReactWrapper.js
src/Store.js
Store
description: A simple Store which receive all state changes with an event (string).

name: constructor
description: The constructor.

name: state
description: The state of store.

name: subscribers
description: Don't touch :)

name: componentsSubscribes
description: Don't touch :)

name: componentsToUnmount
description: Don't touch :)

name: updateState
description: Method to call to change the state.

params.name: newState
params.description: the new state (you can put only attributes changed).

params.name: events
params.description: events to the origin of the state change.

name: subscribe
description:
Method to call to subscribe to an event.

There is a special event that catches all events : '*'.

params.name: callback
params.description: the callback called when receive the event.

params.name: component
params.description: use internally to unsubcribe component when node disappear

return.description: the id to put in param of {@link unsubscribe} to unsubscribe.

name: unsubsribe
description: Unsubscribe.

name: unsubscribeAll
description: Unsubcribe all subcribers.

name: unsubscribeByEventAndId
description: Unsubscribe.

name: src/main.js
predicate
description:
Can be used as a simple if/else statement info your jsx : ``` SimpleDom.renderTo('container',
SimpleDom.predicate(myCondition,

myCondition is true

,

myCondition is false

)
); ```

params.name: element
params.description: element to return if cond is true (if it's a function, the result of the function is returned).

params.name: elseElement
params.description: element to return if cond is false (if it's a function, the result of the function is returned).

return.description: element or elseElement depending of cond value.

name: src/renderer.js
el
description: JSX factory function to create an object representing a dom node. Designed to be used with a JSX transpiler.

params.name: element
params.description: the name of the tag, or a {@link Component}.

params.name: attrs
params.description: properties of the node, a plain old JS object. Not optional, if no value, put empty object.

params.name: children
params.description: the children of the node, a vararg

return.description: an object representing a dom node.

name: renderToDom
description: Render a component to the dom.

params.name: node
params.description: the id or the node where the component must be rendered.

name: renderToString
description: Render some elements into a string.

params.name: elements
params.description: elements returned by {@link el} or primitive like string.

name: renderTo
description: Render some elements into a node.

params.name: node
params.description: the id or the node where the component must be rendered.

params.name: elements
params.description: elements returned by {@link el} or primitive like string.
